content.title: AICTE-Training programs for Physical Education Trainers/Sport-Games Teachers/Director of Sports
content.beneficiary: Physical Education Trainers/Sport-Games Teachers/Directors of Sports
content.details: Training programs for Physical Education Trainers/Sport-Games Teachers/Director of Sports, launched by All India Council for Technical Education, aims to support institutions in conducting trainings to develop the skill of the participants to involve the masses in traditional sports/games and fun games for physical activity through recreation.
benefits: Funding to the institution: ₹ 6,39,000/- per program.
Financial assistance is provided to the host institution to conduct the program.
documents_required: Original Statement of actual expenditure & Utilization Certificate in the prescribed proforma duly signed by the Head of the institution and countersigned by Registrar/Finance Officer/Govt. Auditor, along with bills/vouchers/invoices.
Feedback forms duly signed by the participants indicating their contact details.
Copy of the proceedings and completion report.

faqs.question: What is AICTE-Training Programs For Physical Education Trainers/Sport-Games Teachers/Director Of Sports scheme?
faqs.answer: This scheme aims to Develop the skill of the participants to involve the masses in traditional sports/games and fun games for physical activity through recreation.

faqs.question: Who manages this scheme?
faqs.answer: This scheme is managed by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE).

faqs.question: Mention one of the main benefits of the scheme.
faqs.answer: Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided to the host institution to conduct the program.

faqs.question: What should be the criteria of the institution?
Does the participant will get any certificate?
faqs.answer: A test to be conducted at the end of the program and a certificate to be issued to only those participants who attended the program and qualified in the test.

faqs.question: How can the application be made?
faqs.answer: Host institutions need to submit online applications.

faqs.question: How many participants can join this program?
What is the duration of the program?
faqs.answer: This is a two (2) weeks residential program.
